title: A Breach in a City - The Morning after a Battle
provenance_text:
...Elhanan Bicknell, sold Christies 29 April-1 May 1863, 3rd day (lot 389 as 'The Plague') bt. Samuel Redgrave, sold Christies 24 March 1877 (lot 178) bt. Noseda;...Rev. Stopford A. Brooke; his daughter, sold Sotheby's 9-11 December 1935, 3rd day (lot 620), bt. Ulysses (Jacob Schwartz); Marsden J. Perry, sold American Art Association, NY, 11-12 March 1936, 1st day (lot 36), bt. Sessler for Charles J. Rosenbloom, bequeathed 1973.

(LWL 9/2014, from Butlin, Paintings and Drawings of William Blake, 1981, no. 189)
